metadata.title: Ship Any AI SaaS Startups in hours | ShipAny
metadata.description: ShipAny is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups, Ship Fast with a variety of templates and components.
metadata.keywords: ShipAny, AI SaaS Boilerplate, NextJS Boilerplate

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: News, resources, and updates about ShipAny

my_invites.title: My Invites
my_invites.invite_tip: Invite 1 friend to buy ShipAny, reward $50.
my_invites.no_orders: You can't invite others before you bought ShipAny
my_invites.no_affiliates: You're not allowed to invite others, please contact us to apply for permission.

function.title: Child Height Prediction & Growth Report
function.subtitle: Enter child information to get professional future height prediction, growth curve analysis and personalized recommendations.

form.title: Enter Child Information
form.privacy_note: * Required fields. All information is processed locally to ensure privacy.

errors.birth_date_invalid: Birth date cannot be in the future

results.title: Prediction Results & Report
results.waiting_message: Please fill in the information on the left to get prediction results.

prediction.percentile_desc: Height ranking among children of the same age

khamis_roche.name: Khamis-Roche Method
khamis_roche.description: Scientific prediction combining parental height, current height and age

mid_parental.name: Mid-Parental Height
mid_parental.description: Traditional prediction based on genetic factors

percentile_tracking.name: Percentile Tracking
percentile_tracking.description: Trend prediction based on current growth percentile

growth_chart.title: WHO Standard Growth Chart
growth_chart.chart_description_content: Gray curves represent WHO standard height ranges (10%-90%), blue dot shows current height position, yellow dashed line shows predicted growth trajectory, red dot shows predicted adult height.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Recommendations
nutrition.content: Ensure a balanced diet with adequate protein, calcium, and vitamin D. Recommend daily dairy products, fish, eggs, and leafy vegetables.

exercise.title: Exercise Recommendations
exercise.content: Engage in height-promoting activities like basketball, swimming, jumping rope. Recommend at least 1 hour of outdoor activity daily.

sleep.title: Sleep Recommendations
sleep.content: Ensure adequate sleep as growth hormone is primarily secreted during deep sleep. School-age children need 9-11 hours of sleep daily.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle
lifestyle.content: Maintain healthy lifestyle habits, avoid picky eating, reduce sedentary time, and maintain good mental health.

download.title: Download Report
download.description: Download a complete PDF report with analysis and recommendations

results.pdf_note: Note: PDF report is in English to ensure optimal display quality.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.local_calculation: All calculations completed locally on your device
privacy.no_server_data: No personal information sent to servers
privacy.no_storage: No storage or recording of your input data
privacy.offline_usage: Can be used offline, no data leakage concerns

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This prediction is for reference only. Actual height is influenced by genetics, nutrition, diseases and other factors. Consult a professional doctor for health concerns.
